name: CHAOS Mode
description: Crazy challenges that will shatter every boundary of decency. Only for the most daring!

dares.title: Ridiculous Spy
dares.action: ${c_player}, sneak across the entire room, acting like a spy.

dares.title: Reverse Conversation
dares.action: ${c_player}, try speaking backward for 15 seconds. The others judge how well you did.

dares.title: Wild Animal
dares.action: ${c_player}, become the animal the other players choose and behave accordingly for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Minute of Panic
dares.action: All players simultaneously act panicked on a sinking ship for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Scream Song
dares.action: ${c_player}, sing a well-known song only by screaming it at the top of your lungs.

dares.title: Mad Stylist
dares.action: ${c_player}, create a crazy hairstyle or outfit for ${r_player}.

dares.title: Great Artist
dares.action: ${c_player}, draw ${r_player}’s portrait in the air. The others rate the likeness.

dares.title: Dance of Chaos
dares.action: All players dance at the same time in totally different styles for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Panicked TV Host
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend you’re hosting a show when aliens suddenly attack the studio.

dares.title: Zombie Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, walk around the room like a zombie and try to “scare” ${r_player}.

dares.title: Yelling Compliment
dares.action: ${c_player}, loudly— and strangely— compliment any player.

dares.title: Culinary Fantasy
dares.action: ${c_player}, in 15 seconds invent the most disgusting dish you can and describe its recipe.

dares.title: Radical Politician
dares.action: ${c_player}, give a political speech demanding that everyone start dancing immediately.

dares.title: Orchestra of Madness
dares.action: All players pretend to play the most absurd instruments for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Talking Cat
dares.action: ${c_player}, act as a talking cat who’s complaining about its hard life.

dares.title: Absurd Argument
dares.action: ${c_player}, start an argument with ${r_player} on the most ridiculous topic.

dares.title: Out-of-Control Robot
dares.action: ${c_player}, turn into a robot that’s short-circuited and move chaotically for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Absurd Forecast
dares.action: ${c_player}, give tomorrow’s weather forecast promising a rain of cats and dogs.

dares.title: Mad Professor
dares.action: ${c_player}, deliver a lecture on “how to properly do absolutely nothing.”

dares.title: Group Madness
dares.action: Everyone shouts their own name in different voices and tones for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Clothes Inside Out
dares.action: ${c_player}, put on any item of clothing backwards and keep it on until your next turn.

dares.title: Ridiculous Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, dance as if a balloon is tied to each leg.

dares.title: Pose of Chaos
dares.action: ${c_player}, freeze in the weirdest pose you can and hold it for ${rand(10,20)} seconds.

dares.title: Monkeying Around
dares.action: All players pull faces, jump, and make monkey noises for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Loud Whisper
dares.action: ${c_player}, whisper the phrase “I’m fine” as loudly as you can.

dares.title: Workout for No Reason
dares.action: ${c_player}, do ${rand(5,10)} squats and shout something weird after each one.

dares.title: Living Alarm Clock
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like an alarm clock going off at 5 a.m., using your body and voice.

dares.title: Team Ring Dance
dares.action: All players form a ring around ${r_player} and shout random words while circling.

dares.title: Power of Instinct
dares.action: ${c_player}, close your eyes and find ${r_player} by crawling on all fours.

dares.title: Random Object
dares.action: ${c_player}, pick any nearby object and use it for the wrong purpose for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Single-Letter Talk
dares.action: ${c_player}, for 15 seconds speak using only words that start with "${r_letter}".

dares.title: Model Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, walk across the room like a runway model while balancing something on your head.

dares.title: Silent Tantrum
dares.action: ${c_player}, act out a tantrum without making any sound.

dares.title: Mirror Reflection
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player} act as mirrors: one copies the other’s movements for 20 seconds.

dares.title: Explosion of Emotions
dares.action: ${c_player}, in 10 seconds show 3 strong emotions with the strangest faces you can.

dares.title: Voice Not Your Own
dares.action: ${c_player}, speak in a cartoon character’s voice for the next round.

dares.title: Invisible Chair
dares.action: ${c_player}, sit on an imaginary chair and stay like that for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Double Challenge
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player} must each perform one silly move, one after the other.

dares.title: Everything Opposite
dares.action: ${c_player}, for 30 seconds do everything “backwards”: say “no” when you mean “yes,” and vice versa.

dares.title: Rubber-Boot Jumps
dares.action: ${c_player}, jump 10 times in rubber boots (real or imaginary) while loudly shouting “Woo!”

dares.title: Glass Carousel
dares.action: All players pass an imaginary glass around, saying “chirk” each time.

dares.title: Frog Hops
dares.action: ${c_player}, hop like a frog to ${r_player} and back.

dares.title: Invisible Train
dares.action: ${c_player}, make 3 laps around the room pretending you’re dragging an invisible train behind you.

dares.title: Team Wave
dares.action: All players create a hand wave in sequence—whoever is late drinks.

dares.title: Jump Rope Without Rope
dares.action: ${c_player}, skip an imaginary rope ${rand(10,15)} times.

dares.title: Volume Ramp
dares.action: ${c_player}, say 5 words in a row, each one louder than the previous.

dares.title: Facial Relay
dares.action: Players take turns making a funny face until ${c_player} says “stop.”

dares.title: Lap of Honor
dares.action: ${c_player}, tiptoe around the room whispering “I’m a hero.”

dares.title: Imagination Bend
dares.action: ${c_player}, bend forward as if to kiss the floor and hold for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Vegetable March
dares.action: All players march in place pretending they are different vegetables.

dares.title: Mask of Madness
dares.action: ${c_player}, cover your hair with a scarf (real or imaginary) and say “ha-ha” after every word.

dares.title: Echo Steps
dares.action: ${c_player}, take 5 steps forward, loudly echoing your own voice after each step.

dares.title: Speedy Heels
dares.action: ${c_player}, walk quickly on your heels for ${rand(10,15)} seconds.

dares.title: Group Silence
dares.action: Everyone keeps silent and gestures until ${r_player} says “speak.”

dares.title: Exchange of Glances
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, look into each other’s eyes and blink in sync for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Jump Over Your Shadow
dares.action: ${c_player}, try to jump over your own shadow (or where it used to be).

dares.title: Foot Drawing
dares.action: ${c_player}, “draw” an imaginary picture in the air with your toe.

dares.title: Reverse Countdown
dares.action: ${c_player}, quickly count down aloud from ${rand(10,20)} to 1 without mistakes.

dares.title: Jump Relay
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, jump in place alternately ${rand(5,10)} times.

dares.title: Pillow Fight
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, enact a short fight with imaginary pillows.

dares.title: Zombie March
dares.action: ${c_player}, walk across the room like a zombie, saying “brains.”

dares.title: Laughter for No Reason
dares.action: All players laugh loudly and ridiculously for 10 seconds nonstop.

dares.title: Crab Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, move sideways across the room like a crab for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Chicken Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a short, chaotic chicken dance.

dares.title: Animal Roll-Call
dares.action: Players take turns loudly imitating different animal sounds.

dares.title: Invisible Staircase
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend to climb invisible stairs for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Talk to the Wall
dares.action: ${c_player}, have an emotional argument with the wall.

dares.title: Mad Conductor
dares.action: ${c_player}, chaotically conduct an imaginary orchestra.

dares.title: Seagull Screams
dares.action: All players scream like seagulls for 10 seconds.

dares.title: Funny Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, show the silliest walk you can think of.

dares.title: Friend Parody
dares.action: ${c_player}, do a short parody of ${r_player}.

dares.title: Arm Windmill
dares.action: ${c_player}, rotate your arms like a windmill while saying “wind” for 15 seconds.

dares.title: Penguin Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, act like a penguin dancing in a nightclub.

dares.title: Floor Swimming
dares.action: ${c_player}, pretend to swim crawl stroke across the floor.

dares.title: Loud Laugh
dares.action: ${c_player}, laugh loudly and abruptly, even if nothing is funny.

dares.title: Shaman Wild Dance
dares.action: ${c_player}, perform a short shaman dance to summon rain.

dares.title: Imaginary Sword Fight
dares.action: ${c_player} and ${r_player}, enact a short duel with imaginary swords.

dares.title: Crazy Walk
dares.action: ${c_player}, walk as if on a tightrope over an abyss.

dares.title: Spinning Circles
dares.action: ${c_player}, spin in place ${rand(5,10)} times and then try to stand still.
